page.title: 13A School Day in Yardley
page.content: On Thursday morning I got up at 7.20 a.m., got dressed quickly and went downstairs for my breakfast - marmalade on toast which dad had made. I watched T.V. for a while and then got ready for school. On the way to school I bought some sweets and then we played Tig until the bell went. It was a mixed day at school. We went outside to choose the best in the Bean Bag Race for the District Sports and we had Singing and P.E. but we also had the last of our exams - Spellings, Tables and Verbal Reasoning. For dinner we had egg, bacon, chips and beans. When I got home I played football and rounders with my friends. After tea I went to Football Training with my team The Olton Ravens. When I got home I watched T.V. until 11.15 p.m. and then I went to bed. Richard Wild Aged 10 Cottesbrooke
